H0.text: Which island off Cape Cod was once the site of the world's biggest whaling port. Nantucket

H1.text: Which island off Cape Cod was once the site of the world's biggest whaling port. Martha's Vineyard

H2.text: Which island off Cape Cod was once the site of the world's biggest whaling port. Cuttyhunk

H3.text: Which island off Cape Cod was once the site of the world's biggest whaling port. Coatue

A4.text: This event started the Nantucket whaling industry.

A5.text: By far the largest number sailed from New Bedford.

A6.text: In 1903, Cuttyhunk pilots guided as many as eleven ships a day to New Bedford harbor.
